thread.title: Android 7.0 Nougat firmware for the Three-branded Galaxy S7 and Galaxy S7 edge in Sweden now available online
thread.title_full: Android 7.0 Nougat firmware for the Three-branded Galaxy S7 and Galaxy S7 edge in Sweden now available online

author: Josh L.
title: Android 7.0 Nougat firmware for the Three-branded Galaxy S7 and Galaxy S7 edge in Sweden now available online
text:
Josh L. / 1 hour ago 
If you reside in Sweden and own Galaxy S7 or Galaxy S7 edge locked to mobile network Three bearing the model number SM-G930F or SM-G935F , respectively, you’ll probably be glad to hear that you can now grab the Nougat firmware files from our online database for manual flashing — so you no longer have to wait for the OTA to reach your device to start rocking the latest flavor of Android. Model
